price: (57) Or [lest] it say, "If only Allāh had guided me, I would have been among the righteous."
arabic: أَوۡ تَقُولَ لَوۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: aw taqūla law anna al-laha hadānī lakuntu mina al-mutaqīna
